description:
FREE SHOW! The finale of SEASON FOUR of the Rochester Indie Musician Spotlight features Lost Wax Collective! Each concert at Bop Shop Records and Bernunzio Uptown Music will feature a ten-to-fifteen minute interview with the guest, then a 45 minute set.

Lost Wax Collective is led by drummer extraordinaire Brendon Caroselli, and features a host of incredibly talented musicians. This group combines and twists genres into danceable, intelligent, and grooving music.
name: Spotlight: Lost Wax
